Uses of Interface
smile.nlp.tokenizer.Tokenizer

  • Packages that use Tokenizer 
    Package Description
    smile.nlp
    Natural language processing.
    smile.nlp.tokenizer
    Sentence splitter and word tokenizer.

    • Uses of Tokenizer in smile.nlp

      Constructors in smile.nlp with parameters of type Tokenizer 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleCorpus(SentenceSplitter splitter, Tokenizer tokenizer, StopWords stopWords, Punctuations punctuations)
      Constructor.

    • Uses of Tokenizer in smile.nlp.tokenizer

      Classes in smile.nlp.tokenizer that implement Tokenizer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BreakIteratorTokenizer
      A word tokenizer based on the java.text.BreakIterator, which supports multiple natural languages (selected by locale setting).
      class  PennTreebankTokenizer
      A word tokenizer that tokenizes English sentences using the conventions used by the Penn Treebank.
      class  SimpleTokenizer
      A word tokenizer that tokenizes English sentences with some differences from TreebankWordTokenizer, noteably on handling not-contractions.
